title: Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 15,2019.
text:
Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 15,2019.

Commodities 51 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 13:50)

Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 15,2019. Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 15 * Edible oil prices were mixed in the early trades. * Groundnut oil prices were steady due to restricted buying and selling. * Palm olien eased due to low retail demand. * Sesame oil firmed up due to thin supply. Today's Arrivals; --Groundnut, in 35-kg bags: 0,80,000 versus 1,00,000 previous --Castor seed, in 75-kg bags:0,01,000-0,02,000 versus 0,01,000-0,02,000 previous Groundnut deliveries in 35-kg bags, and
